about_the_game:
Drop adorable fruit to merge them and create even larger fruit in this cozy physics-based puzzle game!

Fruit Salad is a chill puzzle game where you drop bouncy fruit into a container. If two of the same types meet, they merge and combine into the next bigger fruit! From the tiny cherry all the way up to a giant watermelon you can rack up points and aim for the high score!

Game Modes


Classic
The intended way to play Fruit Salad, you can take your time and drop fruit without worry in this mode while you climb the ranks. Try to beat your friends' scores on the Steam leaderboards!

Survival
In this mode it's a race against the clock! The timer is ticking and every match gives you a little bonus time, but if you run out it's all over. How long can you last?

Arcade
In arcade mode the fruits you drop and the ones you match can spawn with special properties! Match them to unleash their abilities and raise your score sky high!

Daily Salad
The Daily Salad lets you play either mode with a set series of fruit drops that changes every day, and everyone gets the same ones! Can you beat your friends' scores on an even playing field?

FAQ

  • Can I stream or make videos about your game? Yes!
  • Can I monetize streams, clips or videos I make about your game? Yes!
  • What's your favorite fruit? Pineapple! (Both on and off of pizza)

May your drops be ever fruitful!
